10.title: SLO Burn rate problem (count)
10.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesPhrase(event.name,"SLO Burn rate") and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
| fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
| filter isNotNull(id)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service_method"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service_method"))
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service"), else:entity)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.application"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.application"), else:entity)
| fieldsAdd event=replaceString(event.name,"SLO burn","SLO Burn")
| maketimeseries `SLO Burn rate problem`=count(), by:{ event }, interval :30m, nonempty:true

11.query:
data record(slo_level="medium")
//service
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.service
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level="medium"
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
  | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
  ]//service method
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.service_method
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level="medium"
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
 | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
  ]
//web application
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.application
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level="medium"
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert_perf=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert_perf:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert_perf=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert_perf:on"),"on",else: slo_alert_perf)
 | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
 ]
| parse toString(tags), """LD 'slo:' LD:slo '\"' """

| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

//SLO alerte
| join [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(event.name,"SLO Burn rate*") and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
  | sort timestamp asc
  | summarize {`alert_burn_rate_close`=countIf(event.status=="CLOSED"), `alert_burn_rate_active`=countIf(event.status=="ACTIVE"), event.id=takeLast(event.id), display_id=takeLast(display_id), event.name=takeLast(event.name),  event.kind=takeLast(event.kind) }, by:{id, event.status, timestamp}
  ], on: { id }, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"alert." 
| sort alert.timestamp asc

//table
| summarize {active=sum(alert.alert_burn_rate_active), close=sum(alert.alert_burn_rate_close), event.id=takeLast(alert.event.id), event.kind=takeLast(alert.event.kind), `latest problem`=takeLast(alert.display_id)}, by: {entity.name, slo_level, slo_alert, slo_alert_perf, id, entity.type, slo}

| fieldsAdd `burn-rate alert`=if(close > 0,"🟡", else: "")
| fieldsAdd `burn-rate alert`=if(active > 0,"🔴", else: `burn-rate alert`)
| fieldsAdd `active/close`=concat(toLong(active),"/",toLong(close))
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="APPLICATION","frontend")
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="SERVICE","service",else: type)
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="SERVICE_METHOD","key request",else: type)
| fieldsAdd tags=record( slo, slo_level=if(isNotNull(slo_level),slo_level,else:""), slo_alert=if(isNotNull(slo_alert),slo_alert,else:""), slo_alert_perf=if(isNotNull(slo_alert_perf),slo_alert_perf,else:""))
| fields entity.name, type,tags, `burn-rate alert`, `active/close`, `latest problem`=if(isNotNull(`latest problem`),`latest problem`,else: ""), event.id, event.kind, id, entity.type

| sort  entity.type asc

12.title: Problems
12.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡")
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(status),status, else: "🟢" )
| fields timestamp, status, event.name
| sort status
| limit 100

13.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡")
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(status),status, else: "🟢" )
| fields timestamp, status, event.name, event.category, event.description, event.status, display_id, event.id
| sort status, timestamp desc
| limit 100

14.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
| summarize count()

16.query:
data record(slo_level="medium")
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.service
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
]
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.service_method
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
]
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.application
  | filter in(tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
]

| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

//SLO alerte
| join [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(event.name,"SLO Burn rate*") and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
  | fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
  | sort timestamp asc
  | summarize {`alert_burn_rate_close`=countIf(event.status=="CLOSED"), `alert_burn_rate_active`=countIf(event.status=="ACTIVE"), event.id=takeLast(event.id), display_id=takeLast(display_id), event.name=takeLast(event.name),  event.kind=takeLast(event.kind) }, by:{id, event.status}
  ], on: { id }, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"alert." 

| summarize close=sum(`alert.alert_burn_rate_close`), active=sum(`alert.alert_burn_rate_active`)
| fieldsAdd status=""
| fieldsAdd status=if(close> 0, "🟡", else: status)
| fieldsAdd status=if(active> 0, "🔴", else: status)
| fieldsAdd `active/close`=concat(status,if(isNotNull(active),toLong(active),else: ""),"/",if(isNotNull(close),toLong(close),else: ""))

17.query:
data record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment, """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| parse segment, """LD '\"variables\":[' JSON:j """
| fieldsAdd result=j[values]
| fieldsAdd selection=if(segment_id!=segmentID,"active segment ➡️ no")
| fieldsAdd selection=if(segment_id==segmentID  and matchesPhrase(result,"slo_level:medium"),"active segment ➡️ ALL (slo_level:medium)",else: selection)
| fieldsAdd selection=if(segment_id==segmentID and not(matchesPhrase(result,"slo_level:medium")),concat("active segment ➡️ ",result),else: selection)
| fields selection

18.title: SLO Burn rate problem (duration)
18.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| fieldsAdd segment=record(segment=$dt_filter_segments, segmentID="{{ .segmentId }}")
| parse segment[segment], """LD '\"id\":\"' WORD:segment_id """
| filter segment_id==segment[segmentID]

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesPhrase(event.name,"SLO Burn rate") and in(entity_tags,"slo_level:medium")
| fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
| filter isNotNull(id)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service_method"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service_method"))
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service"), else:entity)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.application"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.application"), else:entity)
//| maketimeseries `SLO Burn rate problem`=count(), by:{ entity, event.name, id, display_id, event.id, event.kind }, nonempty:true

01.content:
---
---
**slo level = medium**
--- 
SLO medium | SLO user experience performance | SLO user experience success rate |  SLO service success rate |  SLO service method success rate 
--- | --- | --- | ---  | --- 
Type | Application performance | Application  error| Service error | Key Request error 
Target (*) | {{ .target_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }}% | {{ .target_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }}% | {{ .target_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }}% | {{ .target_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }}%
Warning | {{ .warning_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }}% | {{ .warning_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }}% | {{ .warning_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }}% | {{ .warning_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }}%
SLI | % interval with LCP < 4 sec | % user action without error | % service request without error | % service key request without error
Burn rate threshold | {{ .burnrate_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} | {{ .burnrate_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} | {{ .burnrate_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }} | {{ .burnrate_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} 
Alert | {{ .violatingsamples_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} intervals / {{ .Slidingwindow_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} | {{ .violatingsamples_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .Slidingwindow_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} | {{ .violatingsamples_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .Slidingwindow_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }} | {{ .violatingsamples_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .Slidingwindow_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} 
Dealerting | {{ .dealertingsamples_mediumslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} minutes| {{ .dealertingsamples_mediumslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} minutes| {{ .dealertingsamples_mediumslo_servicesuccessrate }} minutes | {{ .dealertingsamples_mediumslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} minutes


(*) default slo period = -{{ .slo_period_day }}d

06.title: SLO medium - service method success rate
